source.query: select p.product_id as source_product_key , p.name as product , p.product_number , c.name as category , sc.name as subcategory , p.standard_cost , p.list_price , p.modified_date , p.row_number as stage_product_row_number , p.batch_id as stage_product_batch_id from stage_product p , stage_productcategory c , stage_productsubcategory sc where p.product_subcategory_id = sc.product_subcategory_id AND sc.product_category_id = c.product_category_id AND c.batch_id > ${batch_id}
